info.name: Remove Twitter Third Column
info.description:
Heh. Twitter moved their footer and "Who to follow" to a third column. Well, I'm going to remove that! 

You can remove the trends part or have larger tweets when viewing them from permalinks too, if you want.
info.additionalInfo:
Changelog:

  • 9th May 2014 15:14: Fixed permalinks tweet + added option to have them larger or not
  • 9th May 2014 14:50: Fixed padding on other pages as well
  • 9th May 2014 01:14: Fix padding that was added on profile pages
  • 9th May 2014 00:55: First release
Timezone: GMT+2

options.label: Yes !
No.
options.value: /* Trends were not removed. You can change that in the userstyle page */
